```{r}
# Install Package
install.packages("plotly")
install.packages("gapminder")
```

```{r}
# Load Package
library(plotly)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r}
# Mengimport Data Gapmider
df <- gapminder
```

```{r}
# Menampilkan 5 Baris Pertama Data
head(df)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Visualization 
fig <- df %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~gdpPercap,
    y = ~lifeExp,
    size = ~pop,
    color = ~continent,
    frame = ~year,
    text = ~country,
    hoverinfo = "text",
    type = "scatter",
    mode = "markers"
  ) %>%
  layout(
    xaxis = list(
      type = "log"
    )
  )
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Menampilkan Hasil Visualisasi
fig
```
